mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Bachus, Franklin
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Fayette Co., W VA [Fayette County, West Virginia]
Gauley Bridge, W VA [Gauley Bridge, Fayette County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Bachus, Franklin Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of the upper 3rd of tibia. Ball sticking 1 inch below (tubercle for the busa) the attachment of the ligament[usa?] patella: bullet taken out by himself - no injuring done to bone that is perceptible. Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Pistol conical bullet. Result: Returned to duty.
